Shopping Mall Planning Generator

购物中心平面布局辅助生成工具

2021 - less than 1 min read time

Team: Biao Li , Baizhou Zhang
Tags: Generative Design Building Layout

Shopping Mall Planning Generator is a research project in cooperation with Shanghai Shuishi, aiming to digitize design patterns and provide a standardized scheme for the initial stage of commercial building design.
